name: Slicker
headline: Recover payment failures and maximize subscription Revenue
description: Slicker eliminates involuntary churn through AI-powered retries, tailored for your business. Our proprietary engine automatically monitors, detects, and recovers failed recurring payments, so you can convert past due invoices into revenue.

founders.name: Dani Penev, Founder
founders.description: Dani Penev is the co-founder and CEO of Slicker, the AI-powered subscription failure recovery platform. He has multiple years of experience in payments, having built global bank transfer solutions at Stripe and Thought Machine. Dani graduated from the University of Glasgow where he worked on a food-delivery startup with his co-founder.

founders.name: Ivan Valkov, Founder
founders.description: Ivan Valkov is the co-founder and CTO of Slicker, the AI-powered subscription failure recovery platform. He has built and scaled products and teams in companies ranging from early-stage startups to large corporations. Ivan co-hosts a podcast and will publish his fantasy novel one day.

# Recover payment failures and maximize subscription Revenue
Slicker eliminates involuntary churn through AI-powered retries, tailored for your business
[Get Started](https://www.slickerhq.com/<./contact>)
[Get Started](https://www.slickerhq.com/<./contact>)
Backed by leaders from
# Stop leaving money on the table
Slicker's proprietary AI engine processes each failing payment individually and converts past due invoices into revenue.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Vh9P4Ad9cmFhVV5oKk182756T6g.svg)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/Y9EvPrXy9bbWCW5ZzhZ1KfSG8WY.svg)
# Features
### Payment recovery on auto-pilot
Slicker automatically monitors, detects, and recovers failed subscription payments. Sit back and let the revenue flow in.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4Umf2pKMuhJPK2724HEDpLullec.svg)
### Payment recovery on auto-pilot
Slicker automatically monitors, detects, and recovers failed subscription payments. Sit back and let the revenue flow in.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4Umf2pKMuhJPK2724HEDpLullec.svg)
### Payment recovery on auto-pilot
Slicker automatically monitors, detects, and recovers failed subscription payments. Sit back and let the revenue flow in.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4Umf2pKMuhJPK2724HEDpLullec.svg)
### State-of-the-art machine learning model
Slicker's machine learning model schedules and retries failed payments at optimal times, leveraging industry expertise and tens of parameters.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7vpOHrlQQAzZzSnbdmx4kcSQaU.svg)
### State-of-the-art machine learning model
Slicker's machine learning model schedules and retries failed payments at optimal times, leveraging industry expertise and tens of parameters.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7vpOHrlQQAzZzSnbdmx4kcSQaU.svg)
### State-of-the-art machine learning model
Slicker's machine learning model schedules and retries failed payments at optimal times, leveraging industry expertise and tens of parameters.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7vpOHrlQQAzZzSnbdmx4kcSQaU.svg)
### Make sense of generic payment errors
Slicker's engine dynamically determines if an error is retryable, taking into account differences between different issuers and historical performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/p7oepZTuN1h1N4YpMghVrl2CEQ.svg)
### Make sense of generic payment errors
Slicker's engine dynamically determines if an error is retryable, taking into account differences between different issuers and historical performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/p7oepZTuN1h1N4YpMghVrl2CEQ.svg)
### Make sense of generic payment errors
Slicker's engine dynamically determines if an error is retryable, taking into account differences between different issuers and historical performance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/p7oepZTuN1h1N4YpMghVrl2CEQ.svg)
### Lightning fast setup
5 minutes. This is how much time you will need in Slicker's dashboard to have your instance up and running. No-code revenue recovery.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CqKieITADBj9qxdB0AIeBcNG1n4.svg)
### Lightning fast setup
5 minutes. This is how much time you will need in Slicker's dashboard to have your instance up and running. No-code revenue recovery.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CqKieITADBj9qxdB0AIeBcNG1n4.svg)
### Lightning fast setup
5 minutes. This is how much time you will need in Slicker's dashboard to have your instance up and running. No-code revenue recovery.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/CqKieITADBj9qxdB0AIeBcNG1n4.svg)
### Leverage multiple payment gateways
Grow beyond the limits of a single gateway. Slicker utilizes your multi-gateway setup, routing payments to maximize success rate. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pMcp131XSqOCoVFcoI3WC2LhVP4.png)
### Leverage multiple payment gateways
Grow beyond the limits of a single gateway. Slicker utilizes your multi-gateway setup, routing payments to maximize success rate. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pMcp131XSqOCoVFcoI3WC2LhVP4.png)
### Leverage multiple payment gateways
Grow beyond the limits of a single gateway. Slicker utilizes your multi-gateway setup, routing payments to maximize success rate. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pMcp131XSqOCoVFcoI3WC2LhVP4.png)
# Boost your MRR with confidence
Whether you need to modernize your legacy billing provider or want to enhance your new-gen solution, Slicker seamlessly handles it all.
###### Fully-transparent AI engine
Machine learning does not mean a black box. Inspect, audit and review every future or historical Slicker action in the dashboard.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/d9mYxGQjEyttmtWC7kL61klVI.png)
###### Fully-transparent AI engine
Machine learning does not mean a black box. Inspect, audit and review every future or historical Slicker action in the dashboard.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/d9mYxGQjEyttmtWC7kL61klVI.png)
###### Fully-transparent AI engine
Machine learning does not mean a black box. Inspect, audit and review every future or historical Slicker action in the dashboard.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/d9mYxGQjEyttmtWC7kL61klVI.png)
###### Complementary with your existing stack
Slicker increases retention rate alongside your existing churn strategy. Continue running built-in retries or leave it all to Slicker.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QFrV1GkbngvJk0pEuUmqWfHh3o8.png)
###### Complementary with your existing stack
Slicker increases retention rate alongside your existing churn strategy. Continue running built-in retries or leave it all to Slicker.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QFrV1GkbngvJk0pEuUmqWfHh3o8.png)
###### Complementary with your existing stack
Slicker increases retention rate alongside your existing churn strategy. Continue running built-in retries or leave it all to Slicker.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QFrV1GkbngvJk0pEuUmqWfHh3o8.png)
###### In-depth payment analytics
Discover trends across customers, geographies, banks, and payment errors. Monitor and analyze improvements over time.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/OlXuDn37p0a6fReRxrrpzrfoXU.png)
###### In-depth payment analytics
Discover trends across customers, geographies, banks, and payment errors. Monitor and analyze improvements over time.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/OlXuDn37p0a6fReRxrrpzrfoXU.png)
###### In-depth payment analytics
Discover trends across customers, geographies, banks, and payment errors. Monitor and analyze improvements over time.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/OlXuDn37p0a6fReRxrrpzrfoXU.png)
###### Results at the front
Slicker's number one priority is increasing your retention rate. We only charge you for successfully recovered payments.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BGY8NmG6gNIddjca9T1l815Sn8.png)
###### Results at the front
Slicker's number one priority is increasing your retention rate. We only charge you for successfully recovered payments.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BGY8NmG6gNIddjca9T1l815Sn8.png)
###### Results at the front
Slicker's number one priority is increasing your retention rate. We only charge you for successfully recovered payments.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BGY8NmG6gNIddjca9T1l815Sn8.png)
###### Enterprise-grade security
Slicker follows the best cloud security practices and is in the process of obtaining SOC2 Type-II compliance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k4in4lhiBu57PBNrkFnHPQ32vk.png)
###### Enterprise-grade security
Slicker follows the best cloud security practices and is in the process of obtaining SOC2 Type-II compliance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k4in4lhiBu57PBNrkFnHPQ32vk.png)
###### Enterprise-grade security
Slicker follows the best cloud security practices and is in the process of obtaining SOC2 Type-II compliance.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/k4in4lhiBu57PBNrkFnHPQ32vk.png)
###### Team of payment experts
Slicker's leadership team has launched products processing more than $1B in payments, banking and asset management
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pBsTBHtXHztzZEgDLTTbP2WGDts.png)
###### Team of payment experts
Slicker's leadership team has launched products processing more than $1B in payments, banking and asset management
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pBsTBHtXHztzZEgDLTTbP2WGDts.png)
###### Team of payment experts

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/pBsTBHtXHztzZEgDLTTbP2WGDts.png)
# Integrations
Reduce your churn without spending a minute of engineering time. Our seamless integrations have you covered.
[View integrations](https://www.slickerhq.com/<http:/docs.slickerhq.com/integrations/overview>)
[View integrations](https://www.slickerhq.com/<http:/docs.slickerhq.com/integrations/overview>)
[View integrations](https://www.slickerhq.com/<http:/docs.slickerhq.com/integrations/overview>)
# FAQs
Find quick answers to commonly asked questions about Slicker.
###### I thought my billing provider offers this.
Billing providers use a limited and/or static approach. All of our users see a 2-4x improvement in recoveries compared with their existing system.
###### What integrations does Slicker support?
Slicker supports popular billing and payment platforms, such as Stripe, Chargebee, Recurly, Zuora, and Recharge, as well as in-house systems.
###### Can I configure Slicker retry settings?
While we recommend leaving all decisions to the Slicker engine, you can set up guardrails like maximum number of retries.
###### What results can I expect?
Slicker customers usually see between a 10 and 20 percentage point increase in the number of recovered payments. 
###### What is your pricing model?
We only charge you for successfully recovered payments. We also offer a 1-month free trial to see the results first-hand before you commit.
###### Can I proactively retain customers?
Yes, Slicker highlights at-risk customers that are likely to experience a payment failure. You can use our managed solution to add a banner to your product with one line of code.

Slicker supports popular billing and payment platforms, such as Stripe, Chargebee, Recurly, Zuora, and Recharge, as well as in-house systems.
###### Can I configure Slicker retry settings?
While we recommend leaving all decisions to the Slicker engine, you can set up guardrails like maximum number of retries.
###### What results can I expect?
Slicker customers usually see between a 10 and 20 percentage point increase in the number of recovered payments. 
###### What is your pricing model?
We only charge you for successfully recovered payments. We also offer a 1-month free trial to see the results first-hand before you commit.
###### Can I proactively retain customers?
Yes, Slicker highlights at-risk customers that are likely to experience a payment failure. You can use our managed solution to add a banner to your product with one line of code.
# FAQs
Find quick answers to commonly asked questions about Slicker.
###### I thought my billing provider offers this.
Billing providers use a limited and/or static approach. All of our users see a 2-4x improvement in recoveries compared with their existing system.
###### What integrations does Slicker support?
Slicker supports popular billing and payment platforms, such as Stripe, Chargebee, Recurly, Zuora, and Recharge, as well as in-house systems.
###### Can I configure Slicker retry settings?
While we recommend leaving all decisions to the Slicker engine, you can set up guardrails like maximum number of retries.

###### What is your pricing model?

###### Can I proactively retain customers?

generated_description:
**Slicker Company Overview**

Founded in 2023 and based in London, Slicker is a Y Combinator Batch S23 startup that focuses on recovering payment failures to maximize subscription revenue. With a lean team of just two employees, Slicker deploys a proprietary AI engine designed to eliminate involuntary churn—a common issue in subscription-based businesses. 

**Mission and Service**

The core mission of Slicker is simple yet powerful: recover failed payments efficiently. Their innovative system automatically monitors and detects payment failures, allowing companies to convert past due invoices into legitimate revenue without manual intervention. This automation provides a seamless experience, freeing businesses to focus on growth while ensuring revenue continuity.

**Features and Technology**

Slicker leverages state-of-the-art machine learning technology that optimally schedules retries for failed payments based on various parameters and patterns. This dynamic approach helps in understanding generic payment errors, enabling a consistent recovery strategy. 

Key features include:
- **Automatic Payment Recovery**: The system operates on autopilot to recover missed subscription payments.
- **Quick Setup**: Implementation is straightforward, reportedly requiring just five minutes of setup time.
- **Integration with Multiple Gateways**: Slicker maximizes recovery success by routing payments through various platforms rather than relying on a single gateway.

Slicker’s team has a strong background, managing over $1B in payments across various sectors. Their strategy includes transparency in AI operations, where users can inspect and audit all actions within the system, reinforcing trust in the technology.

**Pricing Model**

Slicker utilizes a performance-based approach; clients only pay for successfully recovered payments. They also offer a one-month free trial, allowing potential customers to experience first-hand the effectiveness of their service before making any commitments.

**Tagline and Future Goals**

Slicker operates with the tagline “Stop leaving money on the table,” aiming to ensure businesses recover their cash flow potential without the traditional headaches associated with payment failures. Going forward, they intend to further refine their AI capabilities and expand integration options to serve their clients better.

In summary, Slicker presents a smart solution for subscription businesses grappling with payment challenges, helping them maintain revenue streams with minimal effort and maximum efficiency. Check them out at [SlickerHQ](https://www.slickerhq.com) for more detailed insights into their offerings.
